author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LXI REIT Says Acquired Freehold Interest In Stobart Biomass Storage And Processing Plant
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - LXI Reit Plc:
* HAS ACQUIRED FREEHOLD INTEREST IN STOBART BIOMASS STORAGE AND PROCESSING PLANT IN ROTHERHAM, YORKSHIRE IN A SALE AND LEASEBACK TRANSACTION​
* ‍PURCHASE PRICE FOR PROPERTY IS £3.4 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
